findings.title: Finding B02: token fix ownership for some user
findings.description: Token fix ownership for some user allows transferring tokens to another wallet of the same user or even to another user, which represents a bypass to the secondary market.

findings.title: Findings # A01: owner and manager private keys stored in server
findings.description: Storing owner and manager private keys in the server makes the contract vulnerable to attacks on the server. If an untrusted user accesses the server, they can take over the contract with no recovery mechanism.

findings.title: Informative findings # B01: balanceOf function does not revert as expected
findings.description: The `balanceOf` function in `KYC.sol` does not revert for an unknown `owner`, instead it returns 0 if the `tokenOwner` does not exist, which can cause issues in `_beforeTokenTransfer` function in `CRD.sol`.

findings.title: B10: Reorder if statements in merge
findings.description: In String.sol, the `merge` function has an `if` statement that checks the validity of the `offset` input and can be reordered for optimization.
